Title: Clarifies the standard for when a practice has a discriminatory effect
Summary: Clarifies the standard for when a practice has a discriminatory effect; provides that an unlawful discriminatory practice may be established by such practice's discriminatory effect, even if such practice was not motivated by a discriminatory intent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to clarifying the standard for when a practice has a discriminatory effect
